base_description: White spherical object on a brown base.
part_description: The object has a large white sphere with a small brown base at the bottom and a brown cap on top.
internal_interaction_description: The brown base supports the white spherical body, providing stability, while the top brown cap likely serves as a decorative or functional feature, possibly for attachment or securing purposes.
external_interaction_description: The object can be placed on flat surfaces due to its stable base. It may interact with people as a decorative item or tool, depending on its intended use. Its spherical shape suggests it could be rotated or adjusted if designed for interaction.
